content: umbriel hat courtney kelley a free pattern from kelbourne woolens for the year of dk hats umbriel hat ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy specifications stitch patterns yarn k1 p1 ribbing in the round over a mult of 2 kelbourne woolens germantown dk 100% n american round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * around wool 270 yds/100 gm skein 765 highlighter yellow repeat round 1 for pattern 1 skein gauge spiral slip_stitch in the round over a mult of 4 26 sts and 36 rnds = 4 10 cm in spiral slip_stitch on round 1 *c1/1l k2 repeat from * around larger ndls after blocking round 2 *p1 sl1 p2 repeat from * around needles round 3 *k1 c1/1l k1 repeat from * around 1 16 40 cm us 3 3 25 mm circular round 4 *p2 sl1 p1 repeat from * around 1 16 40 cm us 5 3 75 mm circular round 5 *k2 c1/1l repeat from * around 1 set us 5 3 75 mm dpns round 6 *p3 sl1 repeat from * around check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary round 7 k3 *c1/1l k2 repeat from * until 1 st rem slip 1 st notions to cn remove marker k1 replace m k1 from cn stitch markers tapestry needle kelbourne woolens label round 8 p3 *sl1 p3 repeat from * around sewing needle repeat rnds 1 8 for patt size 17 25 44 cm brim circumference unstretched 9 5 24 cm height skills basic cables working from charts worthy of note this gorgeously textured hat is worked in the round from the bottom up slip all stitches purlwise with yarn in back on round 7 of the stitch pattern and rounds 3 7 and 9 of the decrease section you will need to remove the marker in order to work the cable cross over the beginning of the round follow the instructions in the pattern carefully move the work to double pointed needles when there are too few stitches to fit around your circulars comfortably place a marker on the work between the first and last needles to mark your beginning of the round abbrevations c1/1l slip 1 st to cn hold front k1 k1 from cn c1/2ldec slip 1 st to cn hold front k2tog k1 from cn 1 st decrease d for commonly used abbreviations in this and other kelbourne woolens patterns visit kelbournewoolens com/abbreviations ©2026 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 umbriel hat ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy directions spiral slip_stitch chart brim using smaller ndls co 112 sts join for working in the round being careful not to twist sts pm indicating beg of round work in k1 p1 ribbing for 2 5 cm change to larger ndls body next round set-up *sl1 p3 repeat from * around pattern work rnds 1 8 of spiral slip_stitch 7 times from chart or repeat written instructions chart key begin crown decreases round 1 decrease *c1/1l k2tog c1/1l k2 repeat from * knit around 98 sts purl
